1.label: Basics
1.title: Own your private key
1.desc: Your private key is stored within your Nano and you must be the only one to own it to be in control of your money.

2.label: Basics
2.title: Stay offline
2.desc: Ledger Live allows you to buy, sell, manage, exchange and earn crypto while remaining protected. You will validate every crypto transaction with your Nano.

3.label: Basics
3.title: Validate transactions
3.desc: Your Nano works as a "cold storage" wallet. This means that it never exposes your private key online, even when using the app.

4.label: Basics
4.title: Let’s set up your Nano!
4.desc: We'll start by setting up your Nano security.

start.title: The best way to get you started:

0.label: Plan 30 minutes and take your time.

1.label: Grab a pen to write with.

2.label: Stay alone, and choose a safe and quiet environment.

warning.title: Please be careful
warning.desc: Make sure you follow the instructions on this app at every step of the process.

nanoX.label: Turn on your device by pressing the black button for 1 second.

nanoS.label: Turn on your device by connecting it to the USB port of your phone.

nanoSP.label: Turn on your device by connecting it to the USB port of your phone.

blue.label: Turn on your device by connecting it to the USB port of your phone and pressing the power button.

1.title: Browse
1.label: Learn how to interact with your device by reading the on-screen instructions.

2.title: Select “Set up as new device”
2.label: Press both buttons simultaneously to validate the selection.

3.title: Follow instructions
3.label: Come back here to follow instructions on your PIN code.

pinCode.title: PIN code
pinCode.desc: Your PIN code is the first layer of security. It physically secures access to your Nano and your private keys. Your PIN code must be 4 to 8 digits long.
pinCode.checkboxDesc: I understand that I must choose my PIN code by myself and keep it private.

0.title: Choose PIN code
0.label: Press the left or right button to change digits. Press both buttons to validate a digit. Select <1></1> to confirm your PIN code. Select <2></2> to erase a digit.
0.desc: Press the left or right button to change digits. Press both buttons to validate a digit. Select <validIcon></validIcon> to confirm your PIN code. Select <cancelIcon></cancelIcon> to erase a digit.

1.title: Confirm PIN code
1.label: Enter your PIN code again to confirm it.
1.desc: Enter your PIN code again to confirm it.

0.label: Always choose a PIN code by yourself.

1.label: Always enter your PIN code out of sight.

2.label: You can change your PIN code if needed.

3.label: Three wrong PIN code entries in a row will reset the device.

4.label: Never use an easy PIN code like 0000, 123456, or 55555555.

5.label: Never share your PIN code with someone else. Not even with Ledger.

6.label: Never use a PIN code you did not choose yourself.

7.label: Never store your PIN code on a computer or phone.

recoveryPhrase.title: Your Secret Recovery Phrase
recoveryPhrase.desc: Your Secret Recovery Phrase is a list of 24 words that backs up your private keys.
recoveryPhrase.desc_1: Your Ledger Nano generates a unique Secret Recovery Phrase. Ledger does not know what it is.
recoveryPhrase.checkboxDesc: I understand that if someone gets my Secret Recovery Phrase, my assets become vulnerable.

infoModal.title: How does a recovery phrase work?
infoModal.desc: Your recovery phrase works like a unique master key. Your Ledger device uses it to calculate private keys for every crypto asset you own.
infoModal.desc_1: To restore access to your crypto, any wallet can calculate the same private keys from your recovery phrase.
infoModal.title_1: What if I lose access to my Nano?

1.label: Select “Restore recovery phrase on a new device” in the Ledger app.

2.label: Enter your recovery phrase on your new device to restore access to your crypto.

0.title: Take your Recovery sheet
0.label: Grab a blank Recovery sheet, included with your Nano. Please reach out to Ledger Support if the Recovery sheet did not come blank.

1.title: Repeat for all words!
1.label: Write Word #1 displayed on your Nano in position 1 of your Recovery sheet. Then press right on your Nano to display Word #2 and write it down in position 2.
1.label_1: Repeat the process for all words while carefully respecting the order and spelling. Press left on your Nano to check for any mistakes.

2.title: Confirm your recovery phrase
2.label: Scroll through the words until you find Word #1 by pressing the right button. Validate by pressing both buttons.

hideRecoveryPhrase.title: Hide your recovery phrase
hideRecoveryPhrase.desc: Your recovery phrase is your last chance to access your crypto if you cannot use your Nano. You must keep it in a safe place.

0.label: Enter these words on a hardware wallet only, never on computers or phones.

1.label: Never share your 24 words with anyone, not even with Ledger.

infoModal.label: Learn how to hide it
infoModal.title: Where should I keep my recovery phrase?

0.label: <bold>NEVER</bold> enter it on a computer, phone or any other device. Don't take a picture of it.

2.label: <bold>ALWAYS</bold> store it in a secure place, out of sight.

3.label: Ledger will never ask for your recovery phrase.

4.label: If any person or application asks for it, assume it is a scam!

warning.title: Now game on!
warning.desc: Answer 3 simple questions to avoid common misconceptions about your hardware wallet.

0.title: Select “Restore”
0.label: Press both buttons simultaneously to select.

1.title: Select “Restore using Ledger Recover”
1.label: Press both buttons simultaneously to select.

importRecoveryPhrase.title: Restore from recovery phrase
importRecoveryPhrase.desc: Restore your Nano from your recovery phrase to restore, replace or back up your Ledger hardware wallet.
importRecoveryPhrase.desc_1: Your Nano will restore your private keys and you will be able to access and manage your crypto.

warning.title: We recommend Ledger recovery phrases only
warning.desc: Ledger cannot guarantee the security of external recovery phrases. We recommend setting up your Nano as a new device if your recovery phrase was not generated by a Ledger.

0.label: Make sure Bluetooth is enabled on your smartphone and on your Ledger Nano X. Your Ledger Nano X should be on the Dashboard, its main home screen.

errorInfoModal.title: Something went wrong?
errorInfoModal.desc: If you're experiencing Bluetooth issues with your Nano X, please remove the pairing and forget Nano X on your phone. Then try the pairing again.
errorInfoModal.desc_1: It may take a while before the Bluetooth pairing request is displayed. Make sure you verify and confirm the pairing code both on your Nano X and on your phone.
errorInfoModal.desc_2: Check in your phone's Bluetooth settings whether the Ledger Nano X is detected. If it not detected, make sure you turn on the Bluetooth on your Ledger Nano X.
errorInfoModal.desc_4: If the Ledger Nano X is not detected in your mobile app when trying to pair it, please try the following solution:
errorInfoModal.desc_5: Ledger mobile app asks you to allow location services when it's not enabled yet, but on a few phone models, this is not always properly detected. Please note that Ledger mobile app never uses your location information, this permission is simply required for Bluetooth on Android.
errorInfoModal.desc_6: Some users have reported having fixed their connection issues by updating the Android version running on their phone to a newer one. Please check with your phone manufacturer whether an update is available.

0.label: Navigate to the system options for the Ledger Live app on your Android phone.

1.label: Allow the location to be used.

body.intro: Hi! We've updated our Ledger Live Terms of Use with the aim to make them clearer and to reflect Ledger Live's newly available services and features. Key updates are focused on:

main.title: Help us improve and personalize your experience
main.subtitle: Sharing your Ledger Live data helps us understand your preferences and show content that's relevant to you.

able.title: With your consent, Ledger will be able to collect data about how you use Ledger Live (including page visits and clicks):
able.diagAndUsage: To measure the performance of Ledger Live and enhance both the app and your experience (Analytics).
able.personnalizationData: To provide you with personalized recommendations and content tailored to your preferences, as well as to help us measure the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns (Personalization).

unable.title: Ledger Live will never collect information regarding:
unable.personnalInfos: Your personal identifying information (such as your name or your email address).

infoText.info: You can revoke your consent any time in the app settings.
infoText.link: Learn more about how we handle your data

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: To measure Ledger Live’s performance and improve both app and your experience, I agree to the collection of my data, including page visits and clicks

personalizedExp.title: Personalization
personalizedExp.description: To receive personalized recommendations and content that match your preferences and to help us measure the performance of our marketing campaigns, we share app usage data, including clicks, page visits, and conversion data.

infoText.info: You can revoke your consent any time in the app settings.
infoText.link: Learn more about our Tracking Policy

main.title: Let's improve Ledger Live together
main.description: Sharing your Ledger Live analytics data helps us understand how people use Ledger Live, fix bugs, and offer an improved user experience.

bulletPoints.1: Analytics data includes page visits, clicks.
bulletPoints.2: We won’t collect or see any information regarding your balance, accounts, and portfolio.
bulletPoints.3: Analytics are completely anonymous. We can’t see or collect your personal information.

infoText.info: You can revoke your consent any time in the app settings.
infoText.link: Learn more about our Tracking Policy

details.title: Get a personalized experience
details.description: Sharing your Ledger Live personalization data lets us display content that matches your preferences.

bulletPoints.1: Personalization data includes conversion data, clicks, page visits.
bulletPoints.2: We cannot track or collect any of your personal or portfolio information.

infoText.info: You can revoke your consent any time in the app settings.
infoText.link: Learn more about our Tracking Policy

screen.title: Turn on Ledger Sync for this phone?
screen.description: This automatically syncs your crypto accounts across all your phones and computers, even when transitioning to a new device.

deviceAction.description: Follow the instruction which appear on your Ledger’s Trusted Display.

loading.title: Hang tight...

success.syncDesc: Changes in your crypto accounts will now automatically appear across Ledger Live apps on synched phones and computers.

confirm.title: Sure you want delete sync?
confirm.desc: Your crypto accounts on different phones and computers will stop being in sync. This does not impact your funds in any way.

error.title: This app is no longer synced

synchronizedInstances.title: {{count}} Ledger Live app synched

unsecuredError.title: Connect the same Ledger device you used for enabling Ledger Sync
unsecuredError.description: If you don’t have the same Ledger device, select “Delete sync”.

autoRemoveError.title: You can’t remove this phone while you’re using it
autoRemoveError.description: To remove, use another phone or computer with Ledger Sync enabled. If you don’t have another device, select 'Delete sync'.
autoRemoveError.info: Deleting your encryption key will result in your devices becoming unsynchronized, and all synchronized data will be deleted. However, this will not affect your funds. You can resync your accounts at any time.

synchronizedInstances.success: Your Ledger Live app on {{member}} is no longer connected to Ledger Sync

errors.fetching: Something went wrong while fetching your synchronized instances.
errors.ledgerSyncUnavailable: Ledger Sync is temporarily unavailable due to some technical issues on our end. We’re working on fixing it.

explanation.title: Scan and synchronize your accounts using another Ledger Live app

steps.step1: Open the Ledger Live app you want to sync
steps.step2: Go to <0>Settings</0> <1>></1> <0>General</0> <1>></1> <0>Ledger Sync</0> <1>></1> <0>Turn on Ledger Sync</0> <1>></1> <0>Scan QR code</0>

explanation.title: To sync with Ledger Live on another phone or computer...

steps.step1: Open the Ledger Live you want to sync with.
steps.step2: Go to <0>Settings</0> <1>></1> <0>General</0> <1>></1> <0>Ledger Sync</0> <1>></1> <0>Turn on Ledger Sync</0> <1>></1> <0>Show QR</0>

pinCode.title: Enter Ledger Sync code
pinCode.desc: Enter the code shown on your computer to sync your crypto accounts across both apps.

error.title: The codes don’t match
error.desc: Make sure the code you type is the one displayed on the other Ledger Live instance.

scannedInvalidQrCode.title: Invalid QR Code
scannedInvalidQrCode.desc: Only scan the QR code displayed on Ledger Live for synching your Ledger Live apps.
scannedInvalidQrCode.info: For the QR code, open “Settings”, select “General”, and then select “Ledger Sync”, “Turn on sync” and “Show QR”.

scannedOldQrCode.title: Ledger Live update required
scannedOldQrCode.desc: To continue with sync, update the Ledger Live app that’s not up to date.
scannedOldQrCode.info: For more on how to update, <0>check out this article<0>.

unbacked.title: Sync not detected
unbacked.description: Turn on Ledger Sync on either this Ledger Live or the one you're syncing with.

unbackedOnboarding.title: Sync not detected
unbackedOnboarding.description: Come back here after you turn on sync for the other Ledger Live app, and then select “Try again”.
unbackedOnboarding.info: If Ledger Sync is not enabled anywhere, then continue without it.

backedWithDifferentSeeds.title: Different Ledger devices were used to enable Ledger Sync on each app
backedWithDifferentSeeds.description: To sync the two Ledger Live apps, you need to use the same Ledger device.
backedWithDifferentSeeds.info: To fix this, delete sync for one of the apps and turn it on again by scanning the QR code.

alreadyBacked.title: Both Ledger Live apps are already synched

unbackedOnboarding.title: Sync not detected
unbackedOnboarding.description: If Ledger Sync is enabled, select “Try again” and make sure to connect the same Ledger device you used for enabling it.

alreadySecureError.title: This app is already secured by this Ledger
alreadySecureError.description: If you are attempting to create a new backup, please connect the Ledger device you used to create your other encryption key.

alreadySecureOtherSeedError.title: You can’t use this Ledger to sync
alreadySecureOtherSeedError.description: If you still wish to synchronize the two apps, please delete your key and try again.
